articles.title: Rebuilding Alexa: How Amazon is mixing models, agents and browser-use for smarter AI
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa+, a rebranded and enhanced version of its voice assistant. Alexa+ utilizes AI agents and knowledge from the Amazon ecosystem to offer proactive suggestions, answer complex questions, and complete tasks more efficiently. The improved Alexa is powered by Amazon's Nova models and models from Bedrock.

articles.title: Amazon unveils Alexa+ with new capabilities, more knowledge of users
articles.author: The Brunswick News
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Alexa+, a revamped version of its voice assistant, on Wednesday. This new version of Alexa aims to be more conversational and personalized, enhancing user routines.

articles.title: Celebrating innovation: Redmi Note 14 post-launch event in South Africa
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi Note 14 Series, including the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G, in South Africa on February 11, 2025. The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G features an All-Star Armor Structure, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor, AI-driven features, and a 200MP triple camera, and it is now available for purchase at retail outlets, Xiaomi's online store, and partner e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: 7 products to buy for an effort-free clean home
articles.author: Elizabeth Barry
articles.summary: ECOVACS launched the DEEBOT X8, featuring TruEdge 3d cleaning, more powerful suction, and advanced navigation. Philips offers the Handheld Steamer with a quick 30-second heat-up time and compact design for convenient wrinkle removal.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 11 Review
articles.author: Chris Coke
articles.summary: Microsoft launched the Surface Pro 11, featuring Snapdragon X processors and improved display capabilities. Starting at $799, the device offers up to 64GB of memory and 1TB of storage on the OLED version, targeting productivity and streaming. Accessories like the Surface Pro Keyboard and Surface Pen are available separately.

articles.title: Here's how the new Alexa+ could change the price of Amazon Prime
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Amazon unveiled Alexa+, a $19.99 service leveraging generative AI for enhanced capabilities. The service will be initially available to Prime members at no additional cost.

articles.title: Designs.ai Introduces AI Design - Revolutionizing Creativity with Intelligent Automation
articles.author: PRESS RELEASE ACCESS NEWSWIRE
articles.summary: Designs.ai, a part of Pixlr Group, has launched AI Design, an AI-powered feature designed to automate visual content creation. AI Design offers intelligent automation and enables users to generate visuals in seconds using prompt-based editing with 5000 AI templates at launch, helping marketers, entrepreneurs, and agencies streamline their design process. It is available worldwide on the Designs.ai platform.

articles.title: UPDATE -- Helium 10 Ushers in a Bold New Era of AI-Powered Advertising for Sellers with Helium 10 Ads Powered by Pacvue
articles.summary: Helium 10 has launched Helium 10 Ads, a new advertising solution powered by Pacvue's ad technology. This solution combines Helium 10's search optimization insights with Pacvue's enterprise-grade ad technology to help sellers unlock smarter advertising at scale and drive greater profitability.

articles.title: How this young Belfast man is taking his future into his own hands with new business venture
articles.summary: Aidan Davis launched My Property Pros (MPP) South Belfast and Lisburn, an exterior property cleaning service. The business offers window cleaning, gutter clearance, jet-washing, roof cleaning, and soft-washing services using state-of-the-art systems. His partner Jenna will take over marketing and his Mum will manage admin of the new business.

articles.title: Evaluating Lenovo PCs For Consumer And Commercial Market For 2025
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lenovo unveiled new PCs at CES 2025. This demonstrates the company's willingness to take risks in the PC OEM market.

articles.title: NI man on taking his future into his own hands with new business venture
articles.author: Lauren Harte
articles.summary: Aidan Davis launched My Property Pros (MPP) South Belfast and Lisburn, an exterior property cleaning service. The business offers window cleaning, gutter clearance, jet-washing, roof cleaning, and soft-washing services using state-of-the-art systems. Aidan plans to build the business with his partner and mother.

articles.title: Lovehoney Rose Review 2025: This Clitoral Suction Vibrator Lived Up to the Hype
articles.summary: Lovehoney launched the Rose Clitoral Suction Stimulator, a sex toy featuring both suction and vibration modes. The product is USB-A rechargeable, waterproof, and has multiple intensity levels and pulsation patterns. Reviewers found it effective for both clitoral suction and direct contact stimulation, offering satisfying orgasms.

articles.title: UPDATE -- Helium 10 Ushers in a Bold New Era of AI-Powered Advertising for Sellers with Helium ...
articles.author: Helium 10
articles.summary: Helium 10 launched Helium 10 Ads, a new advertising solution combining search optimization insights with enterprise-grade ad technology powered by Pacvue. This solution aims to help sellers unlock smarter advertising at scale and drive greater profitability with AI advertising capabilities.

articles.title: Amazon's AI-powered Alexa+ to cost non-Prime users $20 a month
articles.author: Caroline O’Donovan
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa Plus, a revamped AI-powered voice assistant. It will be available in waves starting next month, free for Prime members and $19.99 a month for non-members. The new product aims to provide a more natural and improved interactive experience compared to the previous Alexa version.

articles.title: Sonic Drive-In adding Mexican-inspired slush with Tajín. Here's when.
articles.author: Annasofia Scheve
articles.summary: Sonic Drive-In is launching the Strawberry Mangonada Slush, inspired by a Mexican treat, for a limited time starting Monday. The slush features strawberries, mangonada syrup, and Tajín, and is priced at $2.99. Customers can order through the Sonic app to be among the first to try it.

articles.title: Sleepout Unveils Revolutionary Clean Blackout Fabric and Expands Innovative Product Line
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sleepout introduces its toxin-free 100% blackout fabric alongside a major expansion of its innovative portable solutions including the launch of the Sleepout Portable 3.0 and the new Sleepout Velcro Shade. These launches redefine industry standards and set a new benchmark for sleep wellness products worldwide.

articles.title: Motorola Razr+ vs Samsung Galaxy Z Flip
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to release the next-generation Razr+ (2025) foldable phone. A recent leak reveals that the phone will be available in a new color option.

articles.title: Motorola Razr+ 2025 Rio Red
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola's Razr+ (2025), a next-generation foldable phone, has surfaced in a leak revealing a new color option. This information suggests an upcoming introduction or launch of the new Razr+ model.

articles.title: Motorola Razr+ 2025 leaks and rumors
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to release its next-generation foldable phone, the Razr+ (2025). Leaks indicate a new color option will be available.

articles.title: Motorola Razr+ 2025 new button
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is releasing its next-generation foldable phone, the Razr+ (2025). A new color option for the phone has been revealed.

articles.title: Motorola Razr+ 2025 expected price
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is developing the next-generation Razr+ (2025) foldable phone. A recent leak reveals a new color option for the device.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a Dyson vacuum dupe that's £280 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a vacuum cleaner, Beldray's AIRAPID Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, as a dupe for the Dyson cordless vacuum. The vacuum cleaner will be available in stores on February 27th, with a price of £49.99 for Lidl Plus members and £54.99 for non-members. Lidl also has launched the Haden 11L Double Stack Air Fryer, which is a dupe for the Ninja Airfryer.

articles.title: Revolutionary Alexa Plus: Generative AI Unleashes Powerful Document Summarization
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, a new and upgraded version of its popular voice assistant powered by Generative AI. This represents a significant upgrade intended to redefine user interaction with technology.

articles.title: Amazon\u00a0debuts new\u00a0Alexa+ with\u00a0voice assistant and AI overhaul
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, a revamped version of its Alexa voice assistant, embedding it with generative AI.  Alexa+ is priced at $19.99 a month for non-Prime users and free for Amazon Prime members, offering enhanced capabilities such as storing customer preferences, connecting to other Amazon products, and reviewing documents. The service will be available in March to some users, with the rollout expanding over time.

articles.title: Imperial Black Debuts in Port Harcourt: An Unveiling of Bold Sophistication
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Imperial Black is launching its premium whisky in Port Harcourt on February 26, 2025. The event will feature music, fashion, and immersive brand experiences to celebrate the introduction of this blend.

articles.title: Best black cherry beauty products to perfect your 90s-inspired makeup look
articles.author: Saskia Kemsley
articles.summary: NUDESTIX offers a multi-stick available in vibrant hues. The creamy formula is designed for monochromatic color on lips, eyes, and cheeks. The product includes a built-in, washable brush for easy blending.

articles.title: Pokemon Presents times for each zone, leaks, rumours and potential Switch 2 gameplay
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company will host a Pokemon Presents video presentation to announce updates and potential new releases within the Pokemon franchise. Speculations include the launch of 'Pokemon Legends: Z-A' for Nintendo Switch and possible remakes of 'Pokemon Black and White' for the same platform. The presentation aims to provide exciting news and updates to Pokemon fans worldwide.

articles.title: McDonald's celebrates 50 years of the Egg McMuffin
articles.author: Mariah Monsour
articles.summary: McDonald's is celebrating the 50th anniversary of the Egg McMuffin with special deals through the McDonald's app. The company also launched bagel sandwiches nationwide, including Bacon, Egg & Cheese and Steak, Egg & Cheese options. McDelivery orders via the app will feature a BOGO deal on Sausage McMuffin with Egg sandwiches from March 3 to March 30.

articles.title: Hear Clearly, Even in Noisy Places
articles.summary: Signia sponsors new technology designed to improve hearing in challenging, noisy environments.

articles.title: Amazon's AI-powered Alexa+ to cost non-Prime users $20 a month
articles.author: Caroline O'Donovan
articles.summary: Amazon has launched its revamped voice assistant, Alexa Plus (Alexa+), enhanced with generative AI. It will be available in waves starting next month, offered free to Prime members and at $19.99 per month for non-members. In addition to accessing Alexa Plus on devices, customers will at some point be able to interact with the technology through Alexa.com.

articles.title: Sweeter Launches a One-of-a-Kind Vintage Citroën for Experiential Marketing
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Sweeter has launched its Vintage Citroën HY Van, which is a customizable platform designed for immersive brand activations. This food truck offers brands a unique way to connect with consumers and can be used for product sampling, pop-up events, and promotional tours. The vehicle supports various marketing initiatives, including gourmet food and drink sampling and mobile retail experiences.

articles.title: Executive Q&A with John E. Flannery, President, Flannery Sales Systems - San Diego Business Journal
articles.summary: Flannery Sales Systems provides sales training to help customers refine and implement a repeatable process to drive revenue. In 2013, Flannery Sales Systems evolved by purchasing the IP of another sales process training company, updated it to reflect market changes, and used it as the foundation to build customized programs for its customers. The company's services are custom-built based on the markets its customers compete in and how organizations buy.

articles.title: The Espresso Display 15 Portable Monitor Can Transform Your Setup, But It'll Cost You
articles.author: Chris Coke
articles.summary: Espresso has launched its latest model, the Espresso Display 15, designed as its most versatile product to date. Priced at $300 ($500 for the touch version), it aims to offer a high-quality screen with minimal setup, targeting users who prioritize screen quality over simply needing extra screen space.

articles.title: The Fresh Market Expands Chicagoland Footprint, Opens New Northbrook, IL Location
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: The Fresh Market announced the grand opening of its seventh store in the greater-Chicago area. The Fresh Market is bringing its passion for freshness and unparalleled service and hospitality to the local community.

articles.title: How I Came to Love the Dusty Powdered Dishwasher Detergent of My Childhood
articles.author: Meet Your
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble reformulated Cascade powder in 2019 to include Dawn detergent. This update aimed to improve the product's ability to clean grease, especially on plastic items like to-go containers and kids' dishes. The reformulated product also contains protease to effectively remove food residues like meat sauce and egg yolk.

articles.title: 'Life-changing' Amazon mattress topper 'like sleeping on a cloud' is now on sale
articles.author: Cork Beo
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the MightySoft Mattress Topper, available in four sizes, with the double size currently discounted by 21%. The topper features a quilted design, microfibre material, and hypoallergenic properties and includes elasticated straps for a secure fit. Competitors like Marks and Spencer and Next also offer similar mattress toppers.

articles.title: Amazon Unveils Alexa Plus
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa Plus, a new generative AI version of their smart assistant.

articles.title: Premium Choice for Start-Stop Vehicle Owners, DF MAX-AGM Start-Stop Battery Makes Grand Debut
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: An unnamed company has launched its new MAX-AGM Start-Stop Battery, featuring three technological breakthroughs. The battery is positioned as a cornerstone of the brand's high-end service ecosystem.

articles.title: Amazon says Alexa+ is "model agnostic", using Amazon Nova models and Anthropic's models, and picks the "best" AI model for a task, drawing on Amazon Bedrock (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, an improved version of Alexa, powered by a model-agnostic system that uses Amazon Nova models and Anthropic's models via Amazon Bedrock. The system selects the optimal AI model for each task.

articles.title: Amazon's new Alexa+ brings AI-powered 'Explore' and 'Stories' features for kids
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Amazon is launching two new features, 'Explore with Alexa' and 'Stories with Alexa,' designed for kids. These features leverage Alexa's new AI capabilities and will be available to Amazon Kids+ subscribers.

articles.title: Ligero Raises $4M Seed Round Led by Galaxy Ventures and 1kx to Introduce The New Chapter In Scalable Data Security and Privacy
articles.author: Ligero
articles.summary: Ligero has launched Ligetron, its flagship security product powered by Zero-Knowledge technology. Ligetron aims to be for Zero-Knowledge what DeepSeek is for Large Language Models.

articles.title: McDonald's launches Cinnamon Swirl available for a limited time only
articles.author: Itai Buenahora
articles.summary: McDonald's Canada has launched the Cinnamon Swirl, a buttery brioche roll infused with cinnamon and topped with cream cheese icing. It is available for a limited time at locations across Canada, priced at $2.99 individually or $10.99 for a six-pack.

articles.title: Amazon debuts gen AI-powered Alexa+, as it seeks to breath life into its aging assistant
articles.author: Daniel Howley
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Alexa+, a new version of its Alexa voice assistant with generative AI capabilities. This version, powered by Amazon's large language models and those from Anthropic, will be available for $19 per month or free for Prime users. Alexa+ aims to offer agentic AI capabilities, allowing it to perform tasks across multiple apps and understand user preferences.

articles.title: The 14 Best Drugstore Shampoos for All Hair Types, Tested and Reviewed
articles.author: Stacia Datskovska
articles.summary: The article highlights several drugstore shampoos from brands like L'Oréal, Mielle Organics, Kristin Ess Hair, Dove, Garnier, Vegamour, Ogx, Monday, Neutrogena, Head & Shoulders, Pantene, and Vichy. These shampoos cater to various hair needs, including color-treated hair, hair growth, clarifying, moisturizing, dandruff control, and damage repair, with options available at retailers such as Amazon, Ulta, CVS, and Target.

articles.title: Amazon finally unveils new Alexa with AI overhaul: ‘Knows almost every instrument in your life'
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa+, a major overhaul of its Alexa voice assistant powered by generative AI. Alexa+ includes features like storing customer preferences, making reservations, sending reminders, and connecting to other Amazon products. Alexa+ is free for Amazon Prime members and $19.99/month for non-Prime users.

articles.title: Amazon launches AI-amped version of its Alexa voice assistant
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Amazon announced a new version of its product or service on Wednesday. This launch signifies the introduction of an updated offering by the online retail giant.

articles.title: Introducing Contentstack EDGE, the World's First Adaptive Digital Experience Platform
articles.summary: Contentstack launched Contentstack EDGE, a new adaptive digital experience platform built for the AI era, unifying its headless CMS, real-time customer data platform, personalization, automation, AI, and front-end hosting capabilities. Contentstack EDGE is capable of delivering adaptive experiences, reacting in real-time to customer interactions, utilizing AI and data-driven decision-making.

articles.title: Living Proof Launches A Breakthrough Approach to Wash Care Powered by Sili-CLONE™ HairTech
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Living Proof is introducing Sili-CLONE™ HairTech, a breakthrough in silicone-free haircare. This innovation celebrates 20 years of the brand's commitment to science-backed solutions for hair problems.

articles.title: Lady Bird Soda Co. Expands from Mixers to Canned Soft Drinks
articles.author: Lady Bird Soda Co.
articles.summary: Lady Bird Soda Co. launched its first line of canned sodas in February 2025, featuring Texas-inspired flavors like Cactus Pear, Lemon Lime, Grapefruit Soda, and Tejas Cola. These sodas, available at Albertsons Companies Southern Division stores, contain 40 calories or less and are vegan, kosher, gluten-free, and non-GMO.

articles.title: Total comfort, peace of mind in the bathroom
articles.summary: American Standard has launched the Smart Washer M-Bidet, a new bathroom product designed for personal cleansing. It features a dual nozzle, side lever design for feminine and posterior cleansing, and odor and stain elimination, ensuring a comfortable and hygienic experience.

articles.title: 28 Beauty Products From Black-Owned Businesses That Work So Well, You'll Think It's Witchcraft
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: Cécred launched a moisture sealing lotion for hair, while Juvia's Place introduced a bronzer duo. Boho Locs offers lightweight boho goddess locs, and Miss Jessie's presents Pillow Soft Curls. Fenty Beauty has a new highlight, and Play Pits features natural deodorants. Buttah Skin offers a facial cleansing device, and Pat McGrath Labs has a powder bronzer and buildable cream blush. The Lip Bar offers liquid matte lipsticks, and Pattern Beauty introduced a hair steamer and strong hold gel. Beauty Strike presents Rosewater Toner, The Doux offers Mousse Def texture foam, and Fenty Beauty's Homecurl curl defining cream is new. Bask and Lather provides strong hold edge control and Cécred offers a rat tail parting comb. Additionally, Glow by Daye offers a bonnet hair dryer attachment, Bread Beauty Supply has a hair mask, Black Girl Sunscreen provides SPF 30, and Danessa Myricks has a skin-blurring balm powder. Camille Rose sells moisture milk and curl-defining gel. Tgin offers a deeply conditioning hair mask and Rucker Roots presents an anti-frizz growth serum. Gemini Naturals has a vegan purple temporary hair color gel.

articles.title: Shoppers say Dyson rival vacuum cleaner 'makes deep cleaning easy'
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Ultenic has launched the U10 Ultra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, priced at £84.98, boasting 4000Pa suction and features like an anti-tangle brush, LED headlight, and up to 40 minutes of battery life. User reviews are generally positive, praising its power and lightweight design, with some comparisons drawn to alternatives like the Shark Classic and Powerffy cordless vacuums.

articles.title: World's First Robot Unboxing - Phone (3a) Series Design Reveal
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Nothing, a London-based technology company, has revealed the design of its upcoming Phone (3a) Series. The full specifications are scheduled to be released on March 4th at 3:30 PM IST and will be available on Nothing's YouTube channel and website.

articles.title: Amazon Unveils Long-Awaited AI Version of Alexa Voice Assistant
articles.author: Matt Day
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a rebooted Alexa with AI, featuring improvements like booking concert tickets and restaurant reservations. The launch was delayed due to challenges in adapting the software to AI and ensuring accuracy. The company aims to revitalize Alexa's performance and engagement.

articles.title: BrowserStack Unveils Comprehensive Test Platform to Transform Software Testing in the AI Era
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: BrowserStack, a software testing platform company, launched its comprehensive Test Platform on February 26, 2025. This platform is designed to revolutionize software testing for engineering teams using AI-driven workflows.

articles.title: Somebody should ask ChatGPT what it means when the CEO of Microsoft declares AI lacks value and starts cancelling data center leases
articles.summary: SpaceX launched Starlink Gen3 satellites, which boast enhanced laser links for faster and more reliable internet, targeting underserved regions. CEO Elon Musk expects the new generation to substantially improve network capacity.

articles.title: Motorola Razr+ 2025 latest news
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola's is launching Razr+ (2025), a next-generation foldable phone. The product will be available with a new color option.

articles.title: Samsung Set to Launch Triple-Fold Phone in July: Here's What We Know So Far
articles.author: Hans India Digital
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to be launching a new triple-fold phone in July, building on its Galaxy Z Fold and Z Flip series. The phone will feature a unique folding mechanism, offering more screen space and versatility, along with advancements in hardware and software. It is expected to fall into the premium category.

articles.title: Notable heywell Expansion: Sparkling Functional Water Brand Accelerates Momentum with Major Retail Expansion and Marketing in 2025
articles.author: EZ Newswire
articles.summary: heywell, a sparkling functional water brand, is expanding its retail presence into almost 900 new stores across the U.S. in 2025, partnering with retailers such as Target, The Fresh Market, Hy-Vee, Fresh Thyme, and Mariano's. The company is experiencing rapid growth, outpacing the flavored sparkling water category.

articles.title: How CLEAR users can improve risk analysis with GenAI
articles.author: Brandon Pimentel
articles.summary: Thomson Reuters has launched a new GenAI-powered tool called Risk Analysis Summary (RAS) within its CLEAR investigative software. The RAS tool is designed to reduce the time it takes CLEAR users to investigate and conduct due diligence on businesses by providing a concise, easy-to-read summary of key data points. This will help users assess risks and identify areas of concern more efficiently.

articles.title: Cynomi Debuts First-of-Its-Kind Solution Showcase for Service Providers to Expand Cybersecurity Offerings and Drive Revenue Growth
articles.summary: Cynomi launched Solution Showcase, a new module for its vCISO platform. This module is designed to help MSPs and MSSPs expand their cybersecurity offerings, align services with client needs, and identify upsell opportunities to accelerate business growth.

articles.title: This Point and Shoot Camera Is All Over Instagram and TikTok. But Is It Good?
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: The Camp Snap camera is introduced as a fun, simple-to-use digital camera with no screen, designed to encourage spontaneity. It features an 8-megapixel sensor, fixed focus, and basic controls, available in various colors. Priced at $65, it aims to provide a carefree photography experience reminiscent of older film cameras, contrasting with modern cameras like the Fujifilm Instax Mini EVO which have built-in screens.

articles.title: Swagbucks Birthday Swag Code Extravaganza with 6 codes today, Feb. 26
articles.author: WRAL
articles.summary: Swagbucks is celebrating its 17th birthday with a Swag Code Extravaganza on February 26th, offering users multiple Swag Codes throughout the day. New users can sign up using the code SMARTSHOP to receive bonus SB points. Swagbucks users earn SB points through various online activities, which are then redeemable for gift cards.

articles.title: Sanctuary AI Equips General Purpose Robots with New Touch Sensors for Performing Highly Dexterous Tasks
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sanctuary AI has integrated new tactile sensor technology into its Phoenix general purpose robots, enabling more effective teleoperation and improved dexterity for complex tasks. The new sensors provide richer behavioral data, allowing embodied physical AI models to be more robust and performant and are expected to broaden the scope and range of tasks the robots can perform.

articles.title: Nüline Distribution Named Official Canadian Distributor of Basil Bangs
articles.author: Nuline distribution
articles.summary: Nüline Distribution partners with Basil Bangs to become the official Canadian distributor of Basil Bangs' outdoor umbrellas, picnic rugs, and lifestyle accessories. This collaboration expands Basil Bangs' presence in Canada, offering premium sun umbrellas, waterproof picnic rugs, and functional outdoor accessories to Canadian customers and commercial settings.

articles.title: vivo V50 is your gateway to stunning photography
articles.summary: Vivo is launching its newest smartphone, the vivo V50, on February 27, 2025. The phone features a 50MP Zeiss OIS Main Camera, a 50MP Zeiss Ultra Wide-Angle Camera, and a 50MP Zeiss Group Selfie Camera and will be available in Ancora Red, Mist Purple, and Satin Black.

articles.title: LOOK: Londie London weaves success in the hair care industry
articles.author: Bernelee Vollmer
articles.summary: Londie London launched her signature braids line nearly two years ago, entering the growing South African hair industry. Her business has shown significant growth, evident in her expanding warehouse. She is also hinting at launching a new product line soon.

articles.title: You'll Feel Like You've Hit The Jackpot With These 28 Affordable Things
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: The article features new products available for purchase, spanning categories from cosmetics and cleaning supplies to kitchen gadgets and pet accessories. These include a long-lasting mascara, a humidifier tank cleaner, a hair removal tool, and a dog paw scrubber, all available on Amazon. Other products like a Skims-esque seamless sculpting bodysuit from Shaperx and antimicrobial toothbrushes from Mouthwatchers are also highlighted, showcasing diverse new offerings.

articles.title: L'Oréal's Vismay Sharma on beauty tech, sustainability and innovation
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: L'Oréal has developed the HAPTA makeup applicator, which enables people with limited motor skills to apply lipstick and mascara more easily. The company also created the AirLight Pro hair dryer, which uses infrared rays instead of traditional heating coils, reducing energy consumption.

articles.title: Author Publishes World's First Book With AI-Driven Cover
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Mark Schaefer launched his new book, 'Audacious,' featuring an AI-driven 'infinity cover'. This was a collaborative effort with Giant Spoon, an independent, integrated agency. The book's cover is designed to be ever-changing.

articles.title: Lightspeed Launches Options Widget to Bolster its Lightspeed Trader Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lightspeed Financial Services Group LLC is introducing the Optionality widget, a new feature for their Lightspeed Trader platform. This tool is designed to streamline options trading by providing traders with a powerful and intuitive interface for entering options strategies with precision and speed.

articles.title: Einstein Bros. Bagels Drops a New Country Hit and Sets Out to Top Charts with First Original Song
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Einstein Bros. Bagels has launched the Country Bagels & Gravy Egg Sandwich, a limited-time breakfast creation featuring a Country Sausage Gourmet Bagel, eggs, bacon, sausage, cheese, and Country Pepper Cream Cheese. The launch is accompanied by an original country song and music video, "Forget the Fork," to promote the new product.

articles.title: Author Publishes World's First Book With AI-Driven Cover
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Author Mark Schaefer, in collaboration with Giant Spoon, launched a new book called 'Audacious' featuring an AI-driven, ever-changing 'infinity cover'. The book cover is an innovative AI-driven feature.

articles.title: Dell XPS 8960 Desktop Review: Alienware in Disguise
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dell is introducing a new product with high performance and a subtle design.

articles.title: New Lidl Cyprus campaign highlights range of Lent buys for shoppers
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus introduces its 'LENT' product line, featuring over 75 Lent-friendly flavors, combining traditional options with modern creations. The company aims to provide high-quality, nutritious, and delicious choices for consumers during the Lent season, highlighted by their new ad campaign.

articles.title: 5 Must-Buy Trader Joe's Items For First-Time Customers
articles.author: Maria Scinto
articles.summary: Trader Joe's introduced the 'Everything But the Bagel' seasoning blend in 2017 and followed up with seasonings like 'Everything but the Elote.' In 2018, Trader Joe's launched 'Seltzers with a Splash' in three flavors. Their 'Hold the Cone' minis won the 2023 Customer Choice Award for best dessert and come in several flavors.

articles.title: Juniper Networks Introduces Purpose-built Solution for GPUaaS and AIaaS Providers to Accelerate AI Delivery and Simplify Ongoing Operations
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Juniper Networks launched a new solution designed for neocloud, traditional SPs, and other AI cloud providers deploying GPUaaS and AIaaS offerings. The solution aims to accelerate time-to-market, simplify operations, lower costs, and deliver high-performance data center networks optimized for multi-tenant environments. This new solution is part of Juniper's Networks for AI solution.

articles.title: Taboola Expands Beyond Native Ads with Realize, New Technology Platform Allows Taboola to Serve the Entire Performance Advertising Market, Delivering Outcomes at Scale Beyond Search and...
articles.summary: Taboola introduced Realize, a new technology platform specializing in performance outcomes beyond search and social media. Realize taps into Taboola's unique data, performance AI, and a diverse range of inventory and creative formats to achieve performance objectives. It allows advertisers to tap into display and more parts of Taboola's network including NBC News, Yahoo, Xiaomi and Samsung.

articles.title: Kraken Robotics Receives $34 Million of SeaPower Battery Orders
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A company is opening a new battery production facility. This facility aims to meet the demand of the defense market. The new facility suggests expansion of production or new capabilities.

articles.title: Google Nest Hub review: so much more than a digital photo frame
articles.author: Adam Waring
articles.summary: Google Nest Hub and Google Nest Hub Max function as smart home devices with photo display capabilities, featuring different screen sizes and resolutions.  The setup involves the Google Photos app, allowing users to display albums and control image display options.  The devices are designed for practical use in various environments, offering a blend of smart home functionality and photo display.

articles.title: Save £55 on a Samsung Galaxy tablet as tech giant offers limited-time deal
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 26% discount on the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9, an Amazon Exclusive tablet. The tablet features an 8.7-inch screen, multitasking capabilities, up to 8GB RAM, and expandable storage up to 1TB. Samsung highlights the tablet's enveloping soundscape and clarity for various entertainment purposes.

articles.title: Taboola Expands Beyond Native Ads with Realize, New Technology Platform Allows Taboola to Serve the Entire Performance Advertising Market, Delivering Outcomes at Scale Beyond Search and Social; Customers Include Babbel, eToro and More
articles.summary: Taboola has launched Realize, a new technology platform designed to deliver performance outcomes at scale for advertisers beyond search and social media. Realize leverages Taboola's unique data, AI, and diverse inventory to achieve specific performance objectives, providing advertisers with a specialized solution focused on ROI. The platform aims to address the diminishing returns advertisers face on other platforms by offering a more effective and scalable solution.

articles.title: New Jersey adult-use cannabis market heats up with new entrants
articles.author: Margaret Jackson
articles.summary: Flower Union, a cannabis brand, is launching its products in New Jersey through partnerships with local businesses. TerrAscend Corp. has expanded its portfolio to include innovative strains, formats and pack sizes.

articles.title: Motorola G85 5G price DROPS to under Rs 15,000 on Flipkart; Here's how deal works
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Motorola G85, a mid-range smartphone, is available under Rs 15,000 on Flipkart due to bank and exchange bonuses. The phone features a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 engine, a 5,000 mAh battery, a twin camera configuration, and a Full HD+ screen.

articles.title: Galaxy G Fold: What to expect from Samsung's triple-folding smartphone
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy G Fold, a triple-folding smartphone. This device features a unique folding mechanism. In addition, Samsung plans to launch the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 in mid-July.

articles.title: Zoup! Unveils Bold Rebrand with Fresh, Eye-Catching Packaging at Expo West
articles.author: Zoup
articles.summary: Zoup! Specialty Products is launching updated packaging for its soups, broths, and broth concentrates, which will become available in stores nationwide in late spring. The new designs enhance the brand's retail presence and strengthen its connection with soup enthusiasts and health-conscious home cooks, featuring vibrant colors, clear typography, and an updated narrative on its recognizable, premium glass jars.

articles.title: Amazon eyes new direction for Alexa with AI overhaul
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon is set to unveil a new AI-powered Alexa service (Project Banyan) designed to be more conversational and act as an 'agent' for users, potentially costing up to $10 per month. While a free 'Classic Alexa' will continue to be available, the new service will roll out to a limited group of consumers, marking a significant upgrade to the voice assistant technology.

articles.title: Lidl fans set to go wild for £18 buy that dries clothes without a tumble dryer – it's perfect for those with a tiny home
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Livarno Home 3 Tier Clothes Airer for £17.99. The airer is designed for drying laundry in small spaces and features fold-out tiers and wheels. Lidl also sells new candles, a dupe for Molton Brown luxury candles, for £3.99.

articles.title: Lidl fans set to go wild for £18 buy that dries clothes without a tumble dryer – it's perfect for those with a tiny home
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Livarno Three Tier Clothes Airer for £17.99 in its stores on February 27th. The airer features three fold-out tiers, hanging lines, pivoting holders for clothes hangers, and wheels for easy transport, and also comes with a three year warranty.

articles.title: Lidl fans set to go wild for £18 buy that dries clothes without a tumble dryer – it's perfect for those with a tiny home
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Livarno Home 3 Tier Clothes Airer for £17.99, designed for drying laundry in small spaces. This new product features fold-out tiers, hanging lines for air circulation, and pivoting holders for up to 12 hangers, available in stores from February 27th.

articles.title: The best Apple Arcade games for 2025
articles.author: Nathan Ingraham
articles.summary: Apple Arcade is a subscription service that offers ad-free games with no in-app purchases across iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple TV. Apple has been adding games originally launched in the App Store to Apple Arcade as well, that meet certain criteria. The service has a number of excellent originals worth playing and offers some of the best games in the history of the App Store.

articles.title: Baidu's YY Live, now infused with DeepSeek, adopts YYDS name in Chinese meme-inspired joke
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: YY Live, owned by Baidu, has launched YYDS, a chatbot powered by DeepSeek's AI models. The chatbot is accessible on mobile and desktop, supporting DeepSeek's V3 foundation model and the R1 reasoning model. Baidu acquired YY Live and plans to reinvest funds into its AI infrastructure.

articles.title: We tried the world's 1st robot vacuum that self-washes as it works, here's what impressed us most
articles.author: Tammi Tan
articles.summary: MOVA launched two new smart home appliances: the Z50 Ultra robot vacuum and the X4 Pro wet and dry vacuum. The Z50 Ultra features HydroSync Mopping and a D-Shaped Track-type Mop, while the X4 Pro includes SpotHeat Spray Cleaning and 180° Lie-Flat Reach. Both products became available on Shopee and Lazada on March 2nd, with special launch prices for the first customers.

articles.title: Graza has a new, high-heat product in its lineup—just don't call it olive oil
articles.author: Julia Selinger
articles.summary: Graza has launched Frizzle, a new high-heat cooking oil made from pressed olives, as their third product. It will be available online and in select Whole Foods locations, packaged in squeeze bottles and a nonaerosol spray bottle. The new product is intended as an olive-based alternative to seed oils.

articles.title: Enabling AI Transformation: TNL Mediagene's Ad2 AI Agent Debuts in March to Revolutionize Smart Advertising Decisions
articles.author: TNL Mediagene
articles.summary: TNL Mediagene's subsidiary, Ad2iction, will launch its ad-tech brand Ad2 in March 2025. This launch includes Ad2 AI Agent, an intelligent assistant designed to improve advertising decisions via data insights and automation.

articles.title: Samsung may launch a triple fold phone in July. Here is what we know so far
articles.author: Dhruv Mohan
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its first triple-fold smartphone, possibly named the Galaxy G Fold, as early as July, alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7. The Galaxy G Fold is expected to have a G-shaped folding design, a 9.96-inch display, and may feature a hole-punch cutout for the front camera. Samsung is also preparing to introduce Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE later this year.

articles.title: vivo V50 in Ancora Red to launch in the Philippines on February 27
articles.author: Bryan Rilloraza
articles.summary: vivo is launching the V50 smartphone in Ancora Red in the Philippines on February 27, 2025. The vivo V50 features a 50MP ZEISS triple camera system, Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor, a 6000mAh battery with 90W fast charging, and enhanced durability with Schott Shield Glass. It also features software upgrades such as Funtouch OS 15 and AI features.

articles.title: Dohatna hosts Samsung Galaxy S25 series launch in MENA
articles.author: The Peninsula
articles.summary: Ali Bin Ali's Dohatna Innovative Distribution hosted the launch of the Samsung Galaxy S25 series on January 22, 2025, at The Outpost Al Barari in Qatar. The launch event showcases Samsung's new product and the distributor's role in its introduction to the market.

articles.title: 'Stunning' £26 New Look dress that 'received compliments all night'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look launched the Brown Twist Shoulder Maxi Dress, priced at £25.99, available in sizes six to 22 and four colors. The stretch jersey bodycon dress features an asymmetrical neckline and an off-shoulder twist strap and has received positive reviews for its fit and appearance.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' £26 maxi dress looks 'much more expensive'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look is launching the Brown Twist Shoulder Maxi Dress, priced at £25.99. The dress is available in sizes six to 22 and in four colors. It features a stretch jersey fabric, bodycon style, asymmetrical neckline, off-shoulder twist strap, covered shoulder, and ruched side seams.

articles.title: New Look's £26 'simple yet stunning' dress that 'fits like a glove'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its Brown Twist Shoulder Maxi Dress, priced at £25.99. The dress is available in sizes six to 22 and four colors, featuring stretch jersey material, an asymmetrical neckline, and an off-shoulder twist strap. Customer reviews rate it highly for its fit and appearance.

articles.title: ரெனோவைப் போலவே நிஸானும் 'மேக்னைட்' CNG மாடலை விரைவில் வெளியிடுகிறது!
articles.summary: Nissan will soon launch a CNG model of its Magnite vehicle.

articles.title: ‘The New ADX Group' to enhance Abu Dhabi's investment landscape
articles.author: Gulf Today
articles.summary: The Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange (ADX) launched 'the New ADX Group.'

articles.title: Digidarts launches AI-powered SEO tool
articles.summary: Digidarts has launched DareAiSearch, an AI-powered search engine optimisation tool (SEO tool). DareAiSearch is trained on data from more than 100 websites across 15 industries and assures structured content indexing and optimised discoverability. Digidarts will initially confine the DareAiSearch rollout to five brands.

articles.title: 'Surplus Saviours': M&S to offer customers free surplus food in new trial
articles.summary: M&S, in collaboration with Neighbourly, is trialling a new surplus food initiative. Customers can collect unsold food from M&S supermarkets, stores,...

articles.title: Youth Ministry, Flutterwave Signs MoU to Advance Youth Empowerment
articles.author: Manomsi Mallum
articles.summary: The Federal Ministry of Youth Development and Flutterwave are partnering to launch initiatives aimed at empowering Nigerian youth with digital skills, mentorship, and funding access. Flutterwave will also streamline stipend disbursements for National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) members, enhancing financial access.

articles.title: Samsung's Triple Folding Galaxy G Fold: Next Big Innovation in Smartphones
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy G Fold, a triple-folding smartphone with a 9.96-inch inner screen and a 6.49-inch external display. Production is planned to start in April with an initial run of 200,000 units to gauge consumer interest alongside the Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 launch.

articles.title: Mutare Swan launch courts Dorcas Moyo
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: A company launched a new cigarette brand, Swan, in Beitbridge and Harare, Zimbabwe, a few months ago. Swan is Zimbabwe's newest cigarette brand.

articles.title: Messy Baby Co. Revolutionizes Baby Blowout Protection with Patented Baby Booty Blowout Gear
articles.summary: Messy Baby Co. has launched its patented Baby Booty Blowout Gear, an innovative onesie designed to manage diaper blowouts. The onesie features an opening front with snaps and an absorbent disposable pad to prevent messes, aiming to make parenting easier and more humorous.

articles.title: Reimagining the world of physical products with TG0
articles.author: David Johnson
articles.summary: TG0 officially launched in 2016 and has evolved from a university concept to a company offering innovative hardware solutions with integrated software.  The company's platform transforms simple materials into touch-sensitive interfaces for industries like automotive and health tech. TG0's technology creates seamless, touch-sensitive surfaces that integrate advanced data collection capabilities.

articles.title: HUAWEI Mate XT: The future of smartphones unfolded
articles.author: Art Samaniego
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Mate XT, the world's first tri-fold smartphone featuring a super slim design, a 10.2-inch Hi-Res HUAWEI X-True Display, and an Ultra Aperture XMAGE Camera. The company also offers the HUAWEI Mate X6, a more affordable dual-fold alternative with a 7.8-inch OLED display and a Kirin 9000 processor.

articles.title: Digidarts launches DareAiSearch to help brands rank on AI Search Engines and LLMs
articles.summary: Digidarts has launched DareAiSearch, an AI-driven SEO solution designed to help brands rank on Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI-powered search engines. DareAiSearch combines expertise in SEO, AI training models, and entity-based search optimization to ensure brands stay discoverable in AI-driven search landscapes.

articles.title: LGs WebOS upgrade smart TV debuts
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: LG Electronics is offering the latest webOS smart TV platform upgrade. This upgrade is available to owners of older LG 4k and 8k Smart TVs, enhancing their existing smart TV experience.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10R India Launch: Snapdragon 8s Gen 3, 90FPS Gaming, Expected Pricing & More- Everything We Know So Far
articles.summary: iQOO has launched the Neo 10R smartphone in India, designed for young users and gamers. The device features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor, a 1.5K AMOLED display, a 50MP Sony Portrait Camera, and a 6400mAh battery with 80W fast charging, and will be available in Raging Blue and Moonknight Titanium colors, expected to be priced around ₹29,900.

articles.title: LG's WebOS upgrade smart TV debuts
articles.author: David Agba
articles.summary: LG Electronics is offering the latest webOS smart TV platform upgrade to owners of older LG 4k and 8k Smart TVs, evolving them into home entertainment hubs. The upgrade provides a more personalized TV experience with a customizable Home Screen and a Quick Card UI that sorts content and services into categories like music, games, and sports.

articles.title: Yango launches food delivery service in Senegal
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: Yango launched a food delivery service in Senegal, expanding its SuperApp offerings beyond ride-hailing and parcel delivery. This move strengthens Yango's position in Senegal's digital economy and increases competition in the online food delivery sector.

articles.title: 47 Tiny Ways To Feel Like You're Living A Truly ~Luxurious~ Life
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: The article highlights several recently launched products available on Amazon, Etsy, and Nordstrom. These include home items and beauty products, new decor items and functional upgrade products. There are multiple products which are the product launches from small businesses.

articles.title: Some fans are criticising Nothing Phone 3a Pro's design
articles.summary: Nothing recently unveiled the design of its upcoming Phone 3a Pro, featuring a transparent back panel and a triple-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main camera, a 50-megapixel periscope lens, and an 8-megapixel ultra-wide sensor. The Phone 3a Pro is rumored to have a 6.77-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and is expected to launch alongside the Phone 3a on March 4.

articles.title: New Galaxy Z Fold 7 leaks indicates Samsung's foldable could get much thinner
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Leaks suggest Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 may compete with Oppo's Find N5. The Z Fold 7 represents a new product offering from Samsung.

articles.title: Google's Call Screen is the best use of AI on Pixel phones
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Google's Pixel Call Screen utilizes AI in the smartphone industry. The content analyzes Google's Pixel Call Screen and explains why it is successful.

articles.title: 'More junk food': Mixed reactions as Wendy's set to open
articles.author: Sophie Day
articles.summary: Wendy's is opening its first restaurant in Southampton at 17 Above Bar Street. This restaurant will offer Wendy's signature square burgers and 'Frosty' desserts. The company has started the search for a general manager for the new location.

articles.title: Wendy's planned opening in Above Bar sparks mixed reactions
articles.author: Sophie Day
articles.summary: Wendy's, an American burger chain, is planning to open a new restaurant in Southampton.  This will be Wendy's second location in Hampshire, expanding its service offerings in the region and aiming to fill a gap in the fast-food market.

articles.title: New AI Feature Allows Image Generation with Adult People, Audience Recommendations, and Asset Testing
articles.author: Babatunde Akinsola
articles.summary: Google has introduced new generative AI tools to its Ads platform, enabling advertisers to generate images, including those with adult people and faces. The update also provides AI-driven insights for asset optimization based on audience recommendations, along with asset testing for Performance Max campaigns. These features aim to enhance creative assets and campaign performance for businesses.

articles.title: XGEN AI Adds Seasoned E-Commerce Executive Amidst Explosive Growth
articles.author: XGEN AI
articles.summary: XGEN developed Generative AI for search, recommendations, and chat for personalized experiences. Charlie Cole highlights XGEN's solutions address consumer pain points by implementing technology that solves consumer's pain points.

articles.title: Freddy's Deluxe Crispy Fish Sandwich now available for a limited time
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Freddy's Frozen Custard & Steakburgers® launched the Deluxe Crispy Fish Sandwich, a limited-time offer available from February 26 to April 22. The sandwich features battered Alaska flounder with tartar sauce, lettuce, pickles, and American cheese on a toasted bun, available via various channels.

articles.title: $100m Highland Park Pak'nSave boosting trolley stock as more than 5700 people pour in
articles.author: Newstalk ZB
articles.summary: Pak'nSave launched its new $100 million Highland Park supermarket. Over 5700 customers attended the grand opening at 7:30 am, requiring the supermarket to bring in extra trolleys to accommodate the demand.

articles.title: Discover The Ordinary's first-ever essence: Multi-Active Delivery Essence for just $20.60
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: The Ordinary has launched its first-ever essence, the Multi-Active Delivery Essence, priced at $20.60. This essence aims to enhance the performance and absorption of other skincare products, providing hydration and improved radiance. Clinical trials showed it doubling the penetration of key ingredients within one hour.

articles.title: Check Out These New, Free Tools in Adobe's Photoshop App for iPhone
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Adobe has launched Photoshop Express version 6.0 with major enhancements, including AI-powered 'generative fill,' which feeds your prompts into an AI that creates pieces of images to stick into your photos. Available tools include changing colors, replacing backgrounds, and removing unwanted elements. A paid Photoshop Mobile and Web Plan is available for $8 per month, adding more features, including advanced blend modes, and access to Firefly-powered tools.

articles.title: Amazon's GenAI-Powered Alexa Plus Is Smarter, Contextual And More Personal
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new version of its voice assistant called Alexa Plus, which features generative AI, improved context understanding, and personalization.  It will be available on Echo Show devices starting in March for $19.99 per month, but free for Amazon Prime members and includes access to the new Alexa website. Amazon has also announced two new features for Amazon Kids+ subscribers, 'Stories with Alexa' and 'Explore with Alexa'.

articles.title: 'Debut economy' boosts China's consumption vitality
org: Institute for Cultural Industries of Shenzhen University
articles.summary: Oppo unveiled its latest flagship product, the foldable Find N5 smartphone, which is notable for its slimness and lightness and integrates the DeepSeek-R1 AI model. Huawei previewed new technologies for its upcoming Maextro S800 flagship sedan, including automatic front-rear vehicle identification and emergency steering technologies.

articles.title: Dragonwing take flight to boost Qualcomm industrial, embedded IoT offer
articles.author: Computer Weekly
articles.summary: Qualcomm has unveiled Dragonwing, a new suite of products, to strengthen its market leadership and drive long-term growth through diversification. The Dragonwing products will be marketed outside of its core segments.

articles.title: Redesigned 2025 Nissan Murano arrives on Guam
articles.author: Guam Pacific Daily News
articles.summary: Nissan has launched the redesigned 2025 Nissan Murano. This new vehicle features premium style and enhanced technologies.

articles.title: DOLE PACKAGED FOODS CELEBRATES "SUNSHINE YOU CAN TASTE" WITH FRUIT-FIRST TREATS, TRENDING MANGO CREATIONS AT NATURAL PRODUCTS EXPO WEST 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dole Packaged Foods, LLC will unveil its new frozen retail recipe, Dole Whip® Fruit First Treat, at Natural Products Expo West on March 4-7, 2025. This introduction aims to provide consumers with delicious mango innovations and treats.

articles.title: Localisation vital to super app success, says Snoonu CEO
articles.author: Gulf-Times
articles.summary: Snoonu, a delivery service, is launching a new offering that includes four different environments. Hamad al-Hajri, the founder and CEO of Snoonu, announced this during a panel discussion at Web Summit Qatar 2025.

articles.title: Amazon's new AI-powered Alexa promises to be your 'best friend in a digital world' for a monthly fee
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Amazon introduced a generative-AI infused Alexa, which offers improved personality and functionality such as tone checking and date planning. This new Alexa will require a paid subscription.

articles.title: "Debut economy" boosts China's consumption vitality
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: Oppo has unveiled its new foldable smartphone, the Find N5, in Shenzhen. The Find N5 is notable for its slim design and the integration of the DeepSeek-R1 AI reasoning model, allowing for voice activation. Oppo aims to deliver an elevated user experience with extended battery life and advanced AI features.

articles.title: A new Alexa AI is coming: What it will cost and when you can try it
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Amazon unveiled its AI-enhanced and 'completely re-architectured' Alexa at an event in New York City. This represents a significant update to their existing Alexa service.

articles.title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 1:02 p.m. EST
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Amazon unveiled a new generative AI-infused Alexa. This updated Alexa will possess increased personality, analyze user tone, and facilitate tasks such as planning romantic dates, available for a monthly fee.

articles.title: Huopan: A One-stop Cross-border E-commerce Shopping Platform, Helping Global Consumers Enjoy Eastern Products
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Xiaomi robotic vacuum cleaners are now being used in Nordic living rooms. Florasis Setting Powder is used by New York bloggers. Chinese products are reshaping global consumption with innovative designs.

articles.title: Amazon Is Running Video Ads in Rufus, Its Gen AI Search Engine
articles.author: Adweek
articles.summary: Amazon is currently experimenting with generative AI ads. In September, Amazon released a product note introducing search ads.

articles.title: "World's supermarket" embraces era of AI
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: A multilingual product introduction video utilizing AI technology has been showcased at the Yiwu International Trade Market in Zhejiang Province, China. Fu Jiangyan, a shop owner in Yiwu, is involved with this initiative.

articles.title: Listen to the NVIDIA (NVDA) Q4 2025 earnings call here
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: NVIDIA will provide updates on its business, including its range of products and services.

articles.title: Graza has a new, high-heat product in its lineup—just don't call it olive oil
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: Graza, known for its olive oils Sizzle and Drizzle, introduced its third product on Tuesday. The company launched in 2022 and has become a standout in the olive oil market with its cleverly packaged oils.

articles.title: Alibaba previews new AI reasoning model to challenge DeepSeek R1, OpenAI o1
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Alibaba Group Holding unveiled a preview of its next reasoning model QwQ-Max. This reasoning model could potentially rival industry-leading competitors.

articles.title: 'Debut economy' boosts China's consumption vitality
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Oppo launched its latest flagship product, the Find N5, a foldable smartphone, in Shenzhen. The Find N5 is notable for its slim design, measuring under 9 millimeters when folded, and integrates the DeepSeek-R1 AI reasoning model to enhance user experience and battery life.

articles.title: Google announces free Gemini AI-powered coding assistant for all users
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: Google Cloud launched Gemini Code Assist. This new offering is designed to assist developers with coding tasks.

articles.title: Major supermarket launches AI-powered tool to help shoppers find the perfect bottle of wine
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: M&S, a supermarket chain, has launched an AI-powered 'Wine Finder' tool on its website and app. This new tool helps customers discover wines that match their taste preferences.

articles.title: Aldi scraps trial of innovative service that offered shoppers cheaper prices
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: ALDI trialed a new service enabling customers to fill their own containers with produce from in-store dispensers to offer cheaper prices. The pilot scheme, part of a solution to reduce single-use plastics, was ultimately scrapped.

articles.title: Messi's new hydration drink hits the shelves of major UK supermarket as fans blast its ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Lionel Messi's new energy drink is appearing in B&M stores in Britain ahead of its official UK launch. The product is considered a rival to KSI's Prime Energy drink.

articles.title: Between You and Me: We may soon be giving personal robots for birthday presents
articles.author: Leah Dunaief
articles.summary: The article discusses the emergence of domestic robots designed for household chores. These robots are capable of performing tasks such as cleaning floors, ironing clothes, folding laundry, cleaning cat litter boxes, making rotis and tortillas, and even patrolling the house for security.

articles.title: Amazon Launches AI Powered Alexa+, Free For Prime Members
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: At Amazon's February 2025 Devices & Services live event, CEO Andy Jassy highlighted the company's 25-year history with AI and its commitment to using AI to solve customer problems. Amazon is focused on innovative AI solutions.
